posts._title: Yuri Mamin & Arkadiy Tigay – Okno v Parizh aka Window to Paris (1993)
posts.title: Okno v Parizh
posts.excerpt: PlotNikolay (played by Sergei Dontsov) has been fired from his job as a music teacher and has to live in the gym until he finds a place to stay. Finally he gets a communal room in the apartment of Gorokhov (Viktor Mikhalkov). The room’s previous inhabitant, an old woman, has died a year ago, and …

posts.title: Poitín
posts.excerpt: Quote:Poitin is widely regarded as a classic of Irish cinema. It tells the story of a Conamara moonshiner, his daughter and two cheating agents who they outwit and bring to a tragic end. The story has a de Maupassant atmosphere, interspersed with comic moments. This is the digitally remastered version (2007) with new score by …

posts._title: Judd Ne’eman – Ha-Simla AKA The Dress (1969)
posts.title: Ha-Simla
posts.excerpt: Three short stories of life in Tel Aviv; A girl meets a boy in a library and has to decide what to do next; A young husband comes home to meet his wife’s boyfriend; A young clerk opens a letter and finds the photograph of an unknown young girl who he then tries to locate.

posts._title: Marek Piestrak – Klatwa Doliny Wezy AKA Curse of Snakes Valley (1987)
posts.title: Klatwa Doliny Wezy
posts.excerpt: An ex marine (Traven), a Polish professor (Tarnas) and a French journalist (Christine) are on the hunt for a treasure in this great Polish b-movie flick. Actually most of the contemporary Polish movies suck. But this one sucks so bad, that it’s enjoyable. You’ve got all the possible cliches here, plus cheesy stop-motion special effects, …

posts.title: Gun Glory
posts.excerpt: Synopsis:In 1886, the gunman and gambler Tom Early returns to his homeland to settle down, but he is rejected by his community. He rides to his farm, where he finds that his wife Alice has recently died and his son Tom Early Jr., who disagrees with taking up arms, is working alone. The next morning, …

posts._title: Jacques Perrin & Jacques Cluzaud & Michel Debats – Le Peuple migrateur AKA Winged Migration (2001)
posts.title: Le Peuple migrateur
posts.excerpt: Quote:This documentary follows several species of migratory birds over a four year filming period. These birds travel several hundreds if not thousands of miles toward the equator in the autumn, and make the return journey to their higher latitude summer homes in the spring, always taking the same route, using the natural compasses of the …
posts.director: Jacques Perrin & Jacques Cluzaud & Michel Debats

posts.title: Eden
posts.excerpt: Quote:A chef discovers that the old saw “the way to a man’s heart is through his stomach” works for women as well in this romantic comedy from Germany. Gregor (Josef Ostendorf) is a gourmet chef who runs a small but highly regarded restaurant in Berlin. Gregor believes that food can awaken the erotic impulses and …

posts._title: Cornel Wilde – Lancelot and Guinevere AKA Sword of Lancelot (1963)
posts.title: Lancelot and Guinevere
posts.excerpt: “Lancelot and Guinevere” (known as “Sword of Lancelot” in the U.S.) is a British 1963 film starring Cornel Wilde and his real-life wife at the time, Jean Wallace. This lesser-known version of the Camelot legend, is a work almost solely made by Cornel Wilde, who co-produced, directed, co-wrote, and played Lancelot. Lancelot is King Arthur’s …

posts.title: Landstormens lilla Lotta
posts.excerpt: It’s time for conscription training outside the small town of Lillköping. The bank clerk becomes an officer – the bank manager an ordinary soldier. Everybody seems to be trying to get a date with Elsa, who makes their food. Nobody takes the training seriously.

posts._title: Anthony Mann – Bend of the River (1952)
posts.title: Bend of the River
posts.excerpt: American Cinematheque wrties:James Stewart stars as a former border raider who narrowly escapes the hangman’s noose (he still smarts from the rope) and is trying to start over again in the wide-open Oregon country. Instead, he winds up involved with the wily and charming Arthur Kennedy in a wagon train that includes the eligible Laurie …
